splash_tagline: Save time and focus on your life
home_subtitle: Clean architecture, localization, and themes are ready out of the box.
home_cta_subtitle: Solid layering, dependency injection, routing, localization, and testing hooks baked in.
onboarding_desc_1: Take control of your digital wellbeing and build healthier phone habits.
onboarding_desc_2: Get detailed insights into how you spend time on your device and which apps you use the most.
onboarding_desc_3: Set daily limits for apps and stay focused on what matters most.
onboarding_feature_3: Beautiful welcome flow: splash ‚Üí onboarding ‚Üí home
focus_today: Focus and save your time today
start_tracking: Start tracking screen time and limit apps now
no_usage_data: No usage data available for the selected period.

positive.time_reality:
Your phone usage is within a healthy range.

You are protecting your time and attention.
positive.health_reality: This balance supports focus, sleep, and mental clarity.
positive.life_warning: Keep going. Your future self will thank you.

negative.time_reality: Every month, you lose around {hours} hours.
negative.health_reality: Your focus, sleep, and emotional balance are being affected.
negative.life_warning:
This habit may cost you {years} years of your life.

But change is possible.

positive.tip_1: Celebrate your success! You've taken control of your screen time and it's paying off.
positive.tip_2: Keep the momentum going! Your reduced screen time shows real dedication to digital wellness.
positive.tip_3: You're building healthy habits! Continue practicing mindfulness with your device usage.
positive.tip_4: Track your wins! Keep monitoring your progress to stay motivated and aware.
positive.tip_5: Share your success! Your achievement can inspire others to take control of their screen time too.

negative.tip_1: Silence distractions: Turn off non-essential notifications to reduce the urge to check your phone constantly.
negative.tip_2: Set time limits: Use app timers and scheduled breaks to create boundaries with your devices.
negative.tip_3: Find alternatives: Replace scrolling with reading, journaling, or learning something new offline.
negative.tip_4: Create device-free zones: Keep screens out of the bedroom and dining areas for better sleep and connections.
negative.tip_5: Move your body: Take regular walks or exercise breaks instead of sitting with your device.
negative.tip_6: Charge away: Place your phone in another room while sleeping or working to reduce temptation.

tips_screen.closing_message_positive: You're doing fantastic! Every small step counts toward a healthier relationship with technology. Keep up the excellent work, and remember that consistency is key to lasting change.
tips_screen.closing_message_negative: Remember, progress isn't always linear, and that's completely okay. Every moment of awareness is a step forward. You have the power to create the digital life you want. Start with one tip today, and build from there. You've got this!

usage_notification.title: Hourly Usage Update
usage_notification.body: You spent {0} hours today. Most used: {1}

validation.select_at_least_one_app: Please select at least one app to block

today.great_job: Great job! You spent only {hours} hours today, which is within the healthy limit of {healthyHours} hours.
today.mental_health: Your balanced screen time helps maintain better mental health and reduces stress levels.
today.physical_activity: By limiting screen time, you're giving yourself more time for physical activities and real-world connections.
today.productivity: Studies show that people with controlled screen time tend to be more productive and focused.
today.keep_it_up: Keep up the great work! Your healthy habits are setting you up for long-term success.

weekly.great_job: Excellent! Your average daily screen time this week was {hours} hours, staying within the recommended {healthyHours} hours.
weekly.mental_health: Maintaining healthy screen time throughout the week helps prevent digital fatigue and burnout.
weekly.physical_activity: Your balanced week allows for better sleep quality and more physical activity.
weekly.productivity: Consistent healthy habits like yours lead to improved focus and productivity over time.
weekly.keep_it_up: Your weekly discipline is impressive! Continue this pattern for lasting benefits.

monthly.great_job: Outstanding! Over the past month, you've averaged {hours} hours daily, well within the healthy {healthyHours} hours threshold.
monthly.mental_health: A month of balanced screen time significantly improves overall mental wellbeing and reduces anxiety.
monthly.physical_activity: Your consistent habits this month have given you ample time for exercise, hobbies, and social connections.
monthly.productivity: Long-term healthy screen habits like yours are associated with better career performance and life satisfaction.
monthly.keep_it_up: You've built an excellent routine! This consistency will serve you well in the future.

today.exceeded: You've spent {hours} hours on your phone today, exceeding the recommended {healthyHours} hours by {excessHours} hours.
today.eye_strain: Excessive screen time can cause digital eye strain, headaches, and blurred vision. Consider taking regular breaks.
today.sleep_quality: High screen time, especially before bed, disrupts your sleep cycle and reduces sleep quality.
today.productivity_loss: Studies show that excessive phone use can reduce productivity by up to 40% due to constant distractions.
today.mental_health: Prolonged screen time is linked to increased anxiety, depression, and feelings of loneliness.
today.life_impact: At this rate, you'll spend about {monthlyHours} hours this month on your phone. Over a lifetime, that's {yearsLost} years lost.
today.take_action: Small changes can make a big difference. Let's explore ways to reduce your screen time and improve your wellbeing.

weekly.exceeded: This week, you averaged {hours} hours daily on your phone, which is {excessHours} hours above the healthy {healthyHours} hours limit.
weekly.eye_strain: A week of excessive screen exposure significantly increases the risk of chronic eye problems and digital fatigue.
weekly.sleep_quality: Consistent high screen time disrupts your circadian rhythm, leading to poor sleep patterns throughout the week.
weekly.productivity_loss: Weekly patterns of excessive phone use create habits that severely impact your focus and work performance.
weekly.mental_health: A week of heavy screen time can elevate stress hormones and reduce your ability to handle daily challenges.
weekly.life_impact: Your weekly average of {hours} hours daily means {monthlyHours} hours per month. That's {yearlyDays} full days per year on your phone.
weekly.take_action: Breaking this weekly pattern is crucial. We'll show you effective strategies to reclaim your time.

monthly.exceeded: Over the past month, your daily average was {hours} hours, exceeding the healthy limit by {excessHours} hours each day.
monthly.eye_strain: A month of excessive screen time can lead to permanent eye damage and chronic headaches that require medical attention.
monthly.sleep_quality: Long-term sleep disruption from high screen time affects your immune system, memory, and overall health.
monthly.productivity_loss: Monthly patterns of excessive use indicate a habit that's likely affecting your career, relationships, and personal goals.
monthly.mental_health: Extended periods of high screen time are strongly associated with clinical depression and social isolation.
monthly.life_impact: Over the next 40 years at this pace, you'll spend approximately {yearsLost} years of your life staring at a screen. That's time you'll never get back.
monthly.take_action: It's time for a change. These proven techniques will help you build healthier habits starting today.
